role-subscribe-queue: wants to be registered to workspace %workspace%
text_update_notification_message: has updated the text "%resource%" in workspace %workspace%
workspace-registration-decline: has declined your registration request in workspace
workspace-role-change_right: has given you access to %resource% in %workspace%

workspace-role-subscribe_user: assigned you the role of "%role%" in %workspace%
